attributes.action: Urgent UK Humanitarian Aid and Essential Supplies to Palestine
attributes.additional_details: These measures are of great significance in addressing the immediate emergencies faced by the Palestinian population, who are currently enduring severe circumstances. The provision of humanitarian aid and essential supplies is not only essential but also a lifeline to alleviate their suffering and foster a more humane situation in the region. Failing to act swiftly poses significant risks to the well-being of the people of Palestine.
attributes.background: We urge the UK government to act swiftly by: 1. Sending urgent humanitarian aid to Palestine, including food, medical, and other essential supplies. 2. Diplomatically supporting the delivery of essential power, water, and food to Gaza, which is mainly controlled by Israel.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Urge the Israel Government to allow fuel, electricity and food into Gaza: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/648383

Increase aid and support for Palestinians: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/648337 

Since you started your petition the Government has also announced £10 million of humanitarian aid to support civilians in the Occupied Palestinian Territories. You can find out more about this here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/uk-announces-10m-humanitarian-aid-for-civilians-in-occupied-palestinian-territories
